text: Sphenarches caffer, the bottle gourd plume moth, is a moth of the family Pterophoridae. It is known from India, Malaysia, Mauritius, the Seychelles and South Africa. The larvae feed on the leaves, flowers and fruits of various plants, including sweet potato. They are small, cylindrical and yellowish green with short spines all over their bodies. ==References== Category:Platyptiliini Category:Moths described in 1852 Category:Moths of Africa Category:Moths of Asia Category:Insects of Mauritius Category:Fauna of Seychelles Category:Moths of New Zealand Category:Taxa named by Philipp Christoph Zeller
title: Sphenarches caffer
